name: Blocked Up
description:
OBJECTIVE:

GET A HIGHSCORE BY MATCHING BLOCKS TO BLOW THEM UP!

USE BRUCE TO HELP YOU GET POWER UPS AND DETONATE BOMBS FOR EXTRA POINTS!

CAREFUL! WHEN HE GETS CRUSHED THE GAME IS OVER, SO KEEP HIM SAFE!!!!

WASD / ARROWS = RUN

SPACE = JUMP

LMB = SWAP BLOCKS

R = RESET HIGHSCORE

ESC = QUIT GAME
